cloudfiles_container_linked: A user linked an Cloud Files container to a project
cloudfiles_container_unlinked: A user unselected an Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_added: A user added a file to an Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_removed: A user removed a file in an Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_updated: A user updated a file in an Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_folder_created: A user created a folder in an Cloud Files in a project
cloudfiles_node_authorized: A user authorized the Cloud Files addon for a project
cloudfiles_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Cloud Files addon for a project
cloudfiles_node_deauthorized_no_user: Cloud Files addon for a project deauthorized
